title: I'm Not Supposed to Show You This...
description: More info:  The ROG Flow Z13 has fallen into the wrong hands. One of the biggest gaming PC's I've ever built   My podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Subscribe!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   sorry asus i promise i wont leak next time
